title: In This World, I Will Fall in Love With You a Second Time - Novel Updates
tags: Death of Loved Ones   Dreams   Female Protagonist   Flashbacks   Time Travel
author: Mochizuki Kurage   望月くらげ
description:
My first romance, the first lover that I ever had — he passed away in the blink of an eye.

One day, his mom gave me a diary – one of the few memoires he left behind. And as if waiting for this to happen, his smile began to shine vividly in my dreams once more.

With these unwavering memories and an ever-changing fate…

In order to create a future where we can be together, I…

Takenaka Asahi, third year high school.

Right as we entered high school, the relationship that I thought would last forever… fell apart.

Trying to console my own heart, I forced myself to think that it was nothing but a fleeting immature love for three whole years.

Then, on the screen of my phone, I saw a name which I held so dearly in my heart. One that I’m sure I’ll never forget.

The message came from—

Suzuki Arata

In the spring of their last year of middle school, he suddenly ended their relationship that began only three months ago and cut off all contact with her afterwards.

“Even if fate denies it, for the two of us, I… I will change history!”>
